signing.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the act of writing your name at the end of a document to show that you agree with it
signing.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The formal signing will take place on April 9th.
the signing of the ceasefire agreement
signing.translation[0].definitions[1].de: someone who has just signed a contract to join a sports team or work with a record company
signing.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: New signing, Mark Brown, scored three goals in his first match.
signing.translation[0].definitions[2].de: when a sports team or record company prepares a contract which someone then signs to say that they will join the team or work with the company
signing.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: Birmingham City have completed the signing of Doug Bell from Shrewsbury Town.
signing.translation[0].definitions[3].de: the use of sign language to communicate to or between people who cannot hear well
